# How to install `hectimetables` from GitHub

```{r setup}
#remotes::install_github("#A COMPLETER")

library(hectimetables)
```

# How to use the Shiny app

The user has three tabs, one for each semester of his/her master. He/she also has at it disposal a sidebar panel, in which his/her choices can be selected and then, by clicking on "Suggest", a timetable that fit the requirement of the student can be generated. 
Furthermore, he/she can choose to have a textual or a visual representation of classes.

```{r setup}
hectimetables::runExample()
```
